wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Merlin (3 August 1884 – 7 April 1945) was a British sports shooter. He competed at the 1906 Intercalated Games and the 1908 Summer Olympics. At the 1906 Intercalated Games he won a gold and bronze medal.
